prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Drums, Synth Lead, Guitar, but without Chromatic Percussion.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Bass, Drums, Synth Lead, and Guitar, omitting Chromatic Percussion.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Bass, Drums, Synth Lead, and Guitar, excluding Chromatic Percussion.

Style 3:
This song is made up of Bass, Drums, Synth Lead, and Guitar, with no Chromatic Percussion.
